CutSceneText.Text: Ah, you are here.... [%username], I've summoned you to entrust you with a special mission.
Are you aware that the Krall's attacks lately have become more intense? This is related to that.
Of course, those puny offensives by the Krall are nothing when compared to the might of our Tijerid...
But, I find it quite suspicious that they've been aiming specifically for the weak spots of our Tijerid forces recently.
And incredibly, the Krall apparently know exactly what our garrison's vulnerabilities are.
They've singled out important military facilities like the supply depots and armories for raids...
And when we send troops in response, they already know the movement route of our troops and withdraw quickly...
None of the units were able to engage the Krall properly in a battle, yet.
This means, it is highly likely that someone who knows our forces well is cooperating with the Krall.
Someone who has a complete grasp of the movements of all units, which is a classified military information of Tijerid...
...Please don't worry about me. Please continue.
I'm saying it is highly probable that those rebels who attempted to assassinate the soldiers of the Elysean Army may have leaked the information to the Krall.
Of course, it still requires a thorough investigation, though.
So I decided that someone should go and find out who is behind the Krall.
And in order to do that, I've set up a plan to infiltrate the Krall's main base and discover what is going on.
What? No way...
Hahahaha! You look pale, [%username]. Don't be too shocked.
As much faith as we have on you, we wouldn't give you an order to kill every Krall in sight and charge to the middle of the Krall's main base.
Well, in my younger days it would've been a piece of cake, but it would be too much for you. Muahaha!
Please stop teasing me and get to the point.
I've summoned you because there are other ways, you know. Do you know of a wizard called [Drenon Mines]?
Yes, during the previous catapult mission...
Oh, this will be easy, then. Go and see that old hag. She should have ready for you a perfect potion you can use to sneak into the Krall den.
I am told that the name of the Krall chieftain is [Shandu]. You should be able to find out where he is by questioning the Goblin Engineer we captured last time.
As [Glass of Tree] in the [Leftwing Port] is guarding the prison, go and ask the chap to see the captive.
I wish you luck, then. [%username].
What did you say!! Jurid that fool...!
Did you definitely see them correctly?
Yes, I swear it was them.
We must mobilize the Blood Sky Knights and the Red Flame Brigade immediately and punish them!
Lord Mikael, you must not hesitate!
...Well, let's calm down a little. We only lacked the evidence, but weren't we already expecting something like this, anyway?
Are you still agonizing over your blood tie, when things have gone this far?!
...No, that's not it. But... Let us not move hastily, without learning just what exactly it is that they are aiming for.
Hm... Well, if you say so, Lord Mikael...
They must be provoking the Elyos sporadically because they are up to something big.
Let's first send messages to the captains of all regional outposts, telling them to increase the number of scouts and follow the movements of Krall closely.
I understand.
Oh, I forgot about you... I am very grateful, [%username], as if not for you we wouldn't have learned of all this.
I will leave the reward for this success with Tellia who is in front of the audience chamber, so don't forget to pick it up when you leave.
Thank you.
